amendment.description: To provide for the availability of funds for Agricultural Research Service research facilities to provide public access.

vote.text: Amendment SA 953 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 953 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6311) To provide for the availability of funds for Agricultural Research Service research facilities to provide public access.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 953 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 953 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 948.
